overview_of_class: Development of message strategies for communicating with consumers and other audiences. Emphasis on understanding audiences, how persuasion works and how brand communications are developed and executed. Hands-on exercises in writing and using digital and social media for effective communications.
name: Message Strategy and Persuasive Communications
title: DOHA STRATCOM 305-0-70 Message Strategy and Persuasive Communications
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: NUQ: Registration is reserved for sophomores and above who have completed IMC303 or IMC330
